mean_en: the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published
sentence: Once the publication process is complete, the book will be available to buy.
sentence_trans: 出版流程一完成，这本书就可以被买到了。
word_etyma: public公众的 + ation名词后缀 → 让公众都看到 → publication出版
